Description.Chinese: 以相同的价格从/向中立贸易者买卖商品和物品，无点差。
Description.English: Buy and Sell goods and items from/to merchants at the same price, no spread.
Description.French: Buy and Sell goods and items from/to merchants at the same price, no spread.
Description.German: Erlaubt es Güter und Items für dengleichen Preis bei Händlern zu kaufen und zu verkaufen, keine Preisdifferenz.
Description.Italian: Buy and Sell goods and items from/to merchants at the same price, no spread.

Description.Polish: Buy and Sell goods and items from/to merchants at the same price, no spread.
